# Tang Zhan (唐斩)

> Senior Architect turned AI Native Developer.
> "Language is Thought."

## Identity
- **Role**: Technical Influencer / AI Programming Evangelist
- **Experience**: 13+ Years (Java, Backend Architecture)
- **Philosophy**: "Arrival" (降临派) - Embrace AI as the new language of thought.
